hero.title: An athlete-centric player profile platform
hero.subtitle: to showcase your story.
hero.description: Showcase your Player Profile and tell your sports story allowing recruiters, scouts, coaches and peers a detailed glimpse into your sport journey and personal narrative, equipping them with the essential information and tools to kickstart the evaluation journey.

features.title: The first ever athlete managed player profile.
features.subtitle: Take control of your sporting journey with our comprehensive platform designed for athletes.

personalizedProfile.title: Personalized Player Profile
personalizedProfile.description: Create your unique digital identity showcasing your achievements, skills, and journey.

uploadMedia.title: Upload photos and videos
uploadMedia.description: Share your best moments, training sessions, and match highlights with the community.

expandNetwork.title: Expand your Network
expandNetwork.description: Connect with coaches, recruiters, and fellow athletes to grow your opportunities.

messageRecruiters.title: Message with Recruiters
messageRecruiters.description: Direct communication with scouts and coaches interested in your talent.

sports.title: For sport players.
sports.subtitle: We currently offer player profiles for Soccer player. You get personalized profile content based on the sport you choose.
sports.futureUpdate: Coming soon. More sports will be added in 2025-2026

section1.title: Showcase Your Journey, Capture Attention, Get Traction
section1.description: Your story is more than just stats and highlights—it's a journey of dedication, growth, and ambition. Our platform empowers you to create a compelling player profile that resonates with coaches and recruiters. Share your personal journey, highlight your achievements, and let your passion shine through. Whether it's on the field or off, your story deserves to be told in a way that truly reflects who you are as an athlete and as a person. Stand out, be noticed, and take control of your athletic future.

section2.title: Player highlight videos
section2.description: Upload and share your best moments with recruiters and coaches. PlayerHub showcases your key plays and skills with our Smart Player system.

recruiterFeatures.title: Recruiters: Tailored Talent Management at Your Fingertips
recruiterFeatures.subtitle: Efficiently manage your recruitment process with our comprehensive tools.

customBoards.title: Custom Boards for Seamless Recruit Management
customBoards.description: Create custom boards to organize and track your recruitment pipeline effectively.

directMessaging.title: Direct Messaging for Instant Connections
directMessaging.description: Connect directly with athletes through our secure messaging system.

teamAccess.title: Collaborative Team Access
teamAccess.description: Share profiles and notes with your coaching staff and team members.

trainersFeatures.title: For Trainers: Showcase, Schedule & Get Paid
trainersFeatures.subtitle: Create your free trainer profile to add sessions, share videos, list prices, and accept payments with no platform fees.

profile.title: Customizable Profile
profile.description: Build a professional profile to showcase your expertise and training services.

schedule.title: Session Management
schedule.description: Create and manage training sessions with flexible scheduling options.

payments.title: Accept Payments
payments.description: Get paid directly through your preferred payment methods with zero platform fees.

newsletter.title: Subscribe
newsletter.description: Stay up to date with the latest features and updates.
newsletter.successMessage: We'll keep you updated with the latest features.

banner.title: Your Story. Your Sport. Your Future. Launching April 30th, 2025
banner.description: PlayerHub launches to help youth athletes showcase their journey and connect with recruiters, coaches and trainers.

getStarted.title: Your Future, Your Profile, Your Way
getStarted.description: Create a player profile that truly reflects your passion and skills. In just a few minutes, you can join PlayerHub and start telling your story.

freePlan.title: Starter (Free)
freePlan.description: Great to get you seen by recruiters, trainers, coaches, peers and more.
features: Manage your Profile: 1 Video and 2 Images

proPlan.title: Pro
proPlan.description: Best if you want to showcase your story and communicate with Recruiters and Coaches.
features: Manage your Profile: 8 Videos and 40 Images

recruiterPlan.title: Recruiter/Coach/Trainers
recruiterPlan.description: Everything you need to find and communicate with players.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need assistance? We're here to help. Whether you're a player, coach, recruiter, or just curious about our platform, don't hesitate to reach out. Our team is dedicated to providing you with the support and information you need to make the most of your experience.

security.question: How secure is PlayerHub?
security.answer: PlayerHub is committed to protecting customer data. We build our platform using best practices for highly available, scalable, and secure cloud applications. We regularly monitor and assess our program to ensure it meets or exceeds compliance and regulatory requirements.

dataProtection.question: How does PlayerHub protect my data?
dataProtection.answer: We honor your global privacy rights and secure your data through robust privacy and security programs. For more details, please visit our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use pages.

cancellation.question: How do I cancel my PlayerHub subscription or trial?
cancellation.answer: To cancel a paid plan, navigate to the billing area in your player profile settings and select Cancel Plan. Log in to your account, click your profile photo in the top bar, and follow the instructions.

cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies. Read our

hero.title: Build Smarter Teams. Manage with Precision.
hero.description: From evaluating talent to finalizing your roster, PlayerHub helps coaches organize, track, and develop players like never before.

playerProfiles.title: All the Right Details. All in One Place.
playerProfiles.description: Each player profile gives you a full-picture view of the athlete—not just their stats.
playerProfiles.conclusion: No fluff. Just the intel you need to assess fit, development needs, and growth potential.

coachBoards.title: Coach Boards That Match How You Actually Work
coachBoards.description: Move players through the evaluation process with three flexible board types:

recruiting.title: Recruiting Boards
recruiting.description: Track athletes you're interested in scouting.

pools.title: Player Pools
pools.description: Organize tryout groups or evaluate potential team fits.

teams.title: Team Boards
teams.description: Finalize your rosters when you're ready to commit.

coachBoards.conclusion: Drag and drop between boards as your decisions evolve. Think of it as your digital war room.

features.title: Everything You Need as a Coach

coachProfile.title: Private Coach Profile
coachProfile.description: Only visible to players you contact. No distractions or unwanted messages.

messaging.title: In-App Messaging with Alerts
messaging.description: Send direct messages and get email notifications when players reply.

notes.title: Player Notes
notes.description: Add coaching insights, development plans, or feedback for each player.

boards.title: Unlimited Boards
boards.description: Run multiple age groups or programs at once—without limits.

sharing.title: Share Boards with Staff
sharing.description: Loop in your assistants or directors with secure board-sharing.

whyLove.title: Why Coaches Love Us
whyLove.description: Private profiles, organize tryouts, track development, communicate with purpose—all free!

cta.title: Bring structure to your chaos.
cta.button: Start building smarter teams—free for coaches

hero.title: Discover Top Talent, Instantly.
hero.description: Every player profile on PlayerHub includes highlight reels, performance data, and player goals—everything you need to scout smarter.

playerProfiles.title: All the Right Details. All in One Place.
playerProfiles.description: Each PlayerHub profile is packed with rich, recruiter-ready data:

videos.title: Match + highlight videos
videos.description: Review game highlights, skills demos, and training footage

history.title: Club and academy history
history.description: Trace player development path and coaching influences

stats.title: Stats, positions, & physical data
stats.description: Analyze key metrics, versatility, and athletic attributes

philosophy.title: Playing philosophy & training insights
philosophy.description: Get a sense of playing style and work ethic

boards.title: Player Boards
boards.description: Create and organize boards by age, position, or recruiting class.

sharing.title: Share Boards
sharing.description: Securely share boards with your staff for collaborative scouting.

notes.title: Recruiter Notes
notes.description: Keep personalized scouting notes right on each player's profile.

messaging.title: Built-in Messaging
messaging.description: Directly message players and get email alerts when they respond.

profile.title: Private Recruiter Profile
profile.description: Only visible to players you message—your privacy, your strategy.

info.question: Q: What kind of information is in a player profile?
info.answer: A: Video highlights, stats, goals, club background, and more.

free.question: Q: Is PlayerHub really free for recruiters?
free.answer: A: Yes, 100% free. No credit card required.

messages.question: Q: Can players message me first?
messages.answer: A: No, only players you message can see your profile and reply.

collaborate.question: Q: Can I collaborate with other recruiters?
collaborate.answer: A: Absolutely! Share boards securely with coaching staff.

finalCta.title: Start scouting smarter, faster, and more confidently.

hero.title: Grow Your Training Business—Without the Overhead.
hero.description: PlayerHub gives trainers a free, all-in-one platform to showcase expertise, host sessions, share pricing, and accept payments—all while reaching motivated players.

profile.title: A Fully Customizable Trainer Profile
profile.description: Make Your Training Program Stand Out

features.videos: Upload videos and images of your sessions
features.customize: Customize it to reflect your style, expertise, and approach

profile.conclusion: Whether you're a solo trainer or a coaching group, this is your digital home base.

sessions.title: Publish and Promote Your Sessions
sessions.description: Your Schedule, Shared with the Right Audience

features.create: Create individual or group sessions with full descriptions
features.urls: Add custom sign-up URLs to your own forms or booking platforms
features.photos: Upload photos to show drills, setup, or training environment
features.discover: Sessions appear on PlayerHub's public Events Page, helping new players discover and join you

sessions.conclusion: Built for flexibility. Designed to convert interest into sign-ups.

payments.title: Accept Payments Seamlessly
payments.description: Add Zelle, Venmo, Cash App, or PayPal so players can pay you directly.

pricing.title: Offer Tiered Pricing
pricing.description: Set rates for private sessions, small groups, or full-team packages.

trainers.title: Add Multiple Trainers
trainers.description: Collaborate with other trainers under a single profile.

videos.title: Share Training Videos
videos.description: Upload highlight clips, technique tutorials, or session breakdowns.

portfolio.title: Build a Visual Portfolio
portfolio.description: Add images to build trust and showcase your environment or coaching style.

why.title: Why Trainers Love PlayerHub
why.description: 100% free platform—no subscriptions, no limits. Boost visibility and reach new athletes. Stay organized with one central place for sessions, media, and payments. Built to reflect the way real trainers operate.

testimonial.quote: I used to juggle Google Forms, Instagram DMs, and Cash App. Now I have one place for everything—and players take me more seriously.
testimonial.author: — Private Trainer, California

payments.question: Q: Does PlayerHub take a cut of my payments?
payments.answer: A: No. Payments go directly through your preferred method (Zelle, PayPal, etc).

booking.question: Q: Can I link to an external booking form?
booking.answer: A: Yes! Use any sign-up or payment platform you prefer—just drop in the link.

multiple.question: Q: Can I add multiple trainers under one profile?
multiple.answer: A: Absolutely. Ideal for training groups or small organizations.

find.question: Q: How do players find my sessions?
find.answer: A: All public sessions are shown on our Events Page, visible to every PlayerHub user.

cost.question: Q: What does it cost to join?
cost.answer: A: Nothing. PlayerHub is 100% free for trainers.

finalCta.title: Ready to grow your training program the smart way?
finalCta.button: Create your free Trainer profile today
